content.text: Dr. Kyukyu is a doctor in Water 7. He examined Iceburg after he was shot by the CP9.
He is a partly bald man with a red nose and a medical cross on his forehead. He has a bushy mustache and bushy hair. He wears a sleeveless shirt, and dark colored pants.
Not much is known about his personality, but he seems straightforward and soft spoken, calmly diagnosing Iceburg's injury without concern.
He is very knowledgeable in the medical field, treating Iceburg's severe wounds.
Kyukyu examined Iceburg after he was shot by Robin in his assassination attempt.

elements.text: His name in Japanese means "first aid".
â†‘  One Piece Blue Deep: Characters World (p. 213), his name is revealed.
